description:
⛱️ PyData Bristol - Summer Social ⛱️

[Generated using HuggingChat]:
Join us for our annual summer social at the Left Handed Giant Brewpub \| Finzel's Reach Bristol\! We'll have delicious wood\-fired pizzas available all night long\, along with plenty of cold drinks to keep you cool on this hot summer evening\. This event is open to everyone \- whether you're part of our regular group or just looking to make some new friends over a slice of cheesy goodness\. Come by yourself or bring your whole crew \- we can't wait to see you there\!

Next lectures session will start on September so if you would like to speak at that event or at a future event - please fill out this form: https://goo.gl/forms/8lsz1WA1986Ahbbs1

# 🕖 LOGISTICS

We will meeting at Left Handed Giant Brewpub \| Finzel's Reach Bristol\, You should be able to spot the organisers there\.
If you realise you can't make it, please un-RSVP in good time so we know roughly how many of us will be there.
Follow @pydatabristol (https://twitter.com/pydatabristol) for updates on this and future events, as well as news from the global PyData community.

# 📜 CODE OF CONDUCT

The PyData Code of Conduct governs this meetup (https://pydata.org/code-of-conduct/). To discuss any issues or concerns relating to the code of conduct or behavior of anyone at the PyData meetup, please contact the PyData Bristol organisers, or you can submit a report of any potential Code of Conduct violation directly to NumFOCUS (https://numfocus.typeform.com/to/ynjGdT).
title: PyData Bristol - Summer Social ⛱️
